'''1.16 Pre-release 6''' (known as '''1.16-pre6''' in the [[launcher]]) is the sixth pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.16]], released on June 15, 2020,<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-16-pre-release-6|Minecraft 1.16 Pre-Release 6|June 15, 2020}}</ref> which adds new material and map colors and fixes bugs.

== Additions ==
=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Advancement]]s'''
* Added <code>player_interacted_with_entity</code> advancement trigger.
** <code>item</code> matches the item which was in the player's hand during interaction.
** <code>entity</code> matches the entity which was interacted with.

'''[[Material]]s'''
* Added seven new material colors:
** {{color|#bd3031}} <code>CRIMSON_NYLIUM</code>
** {{color|#943f61}} <code>CRIMSON_STEM</code>
** {{color|#5c191d}} <code>CRIMSON_HYPHAE</code>
** {{color|#167e86}} <code>WARPED_NYLIUM</code>
** {{color|#3a8e8c}} <code>WARPED_STEM</code>
** {{color|#562c3e}} <code>WARPED_HYPHAE</code>
** {{color|#14b485}} <code>WARPED_WART_BLOCK</code>

== Changes ==
=== Mobs ===
'''[[Hoglin]]s and [[zoglin]]s'''
* Each tusk can now be individually textured.
* Knockback resistance has been increased from 0.5 to 0.6.

'''[[Piglin]]s'''
* Can now spawn with enchanted [[armor]].

'''[[Ravager]]s'''
* Now have their knockback resistance increased. 

'''[[Zombified piglin]]s'''
* Changed the subtitle for angry grunts from "Zombified Piglin angers" to "Zombified Piglin grunts angrily".

=== World generation ===
'''[[Zombie village]]s'''
* The zombie villagers that spawn in zombie [[village]]s no longer despawn.

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Advancement]]s'''
* The advancement "Oh Shiny" is now also earned when a gold-related item is {{ctrl|used}} on a piglin, whereas previously it would only be earned when a piglin picks it up.

'''[[Map]] colors'''
* With the addition of new material colors, map colors have been updated accordingly.
** Warped stems, stripped warped stems, and warped planks now use the <code>WARPED_STEM</code> color instead of the <code>COLOR_CYAN</code> color.
** Warped hyphae and stripped warped hyphae now use the <code>WARPED_HYPHAE</code> color instead of the <code>COLOR_CYAN</code> color.
** Warped nylium now uses the <code>WARPED_NYLIUM</code> color instead of the <code>COLOR_CYAN</code> color.
** Warped fungi and twisting vines now use the <code>COLOR_CYAN</code> color instead of the <code>PLANT</code> color.
** Warped wart blocks now use the <code>WARPED_WART_BLOCK</code> color instead of the <code>COLOR_CYAN</code> color.
** Crimson stems and stripped crimson stems now use the <code>CRIMSON_STEM</code> color instead of the <code>COLOR_RED</code> color.
** Crimson hyphae and stripped crimson hyphae now use the <code>CRIMSON_HYPHAE</code> color instead of the <code>COLOR_RED</code> color.
** Crimson nylium now uses the <code>CRIMSON_NYLIUM</code> color instead of the <code>COLOR_RED</code> color.
** Crimson fungi and weeping vines now use the <code>NETHER</code> color instead of the <code>PLANT</code> color.
** Crimson planks now use the <code>CRIMSON_STEM</code> color instead of the <code>NETHER</code> color.

=== General ===
'''[[Game mode switcher]]'''
* Opening the game mode switcher menu now has a default selection if the player has not entered a different game mode before in that world.
** By default, the player now selects Creative if currently in any other game mode, and Survival if currently in Creative.

'''[[Recipe book]]'''
* There is now a text that says "Search..." in the recipe book.
